feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
